comments: He\'s really nice and the class is easy, and can be boring. It\'s a nice relaxed class.

Ultra boring class but was very easy grade. Book project is major part of grade. He is a very nice guy however accent is difficult to understand. Once you get past his accent you are good to go. He is a very easy grader. This class was a good GPA booster.
EASY A the only problem is that class is extremely boring. But dont go into the class thinking that your going to come out knowing something more. This class is realy just a grade booster.

Such a waste of my time, has no idea what he is talking about and did nothing but confuse me. His readings are beyond boring and just impossible to get through. I spent the whole class annoyed at the fact that I was sitting there learning nothing. Avoid if you can.
Kinda boring, but its not hard at all to get a good grade.
Easy class, boring at times. I didn\'t even read the books for the mid term and still got in A in the class

Although the class is a little dull at times, he\'s a very nice guy who will honestly help you out if you need it. The class does get into great conversations, and he wants us to talk. He even knows that when noone talks, the class is booring

ULTRA BORING! dont even register unless you know you want to be bored out of your mind. The class does not seem that hard,but the readings are dumb hard to understand and he sounds so uninterested in the class. oh and he says "right" at the end of each sentence. so annoying
